entries.source:
Chat Edit: 'I want to implement screensaver like Omarchy and Symphony
the workflows of the screen saver in text format for both omarchy and symhony are there in the /omarchy folder shared.
the original configuration for omarchy screen save is in the ormarchy folder.
the original configuration for symphony screen save is in the dotfiles folder shared.
The config file of the hyprland which I'm using in the .config folder shared.
without changing the original codes in the .config folder. Help me implement the screensaver like the omarchy and the symphony.
analyse the files in detail and tell me if it is possible without any crase in the hyprland I am using '
